snippet: The world’s largest soft-drink maker reported a net income of $1.65 billion in the latest quarter, beating analysts’ estimates.
abstract: Coca-Cola Company reports fourth-quarter profit that topped analysts' estimates; profit was 79 cents a share, exceeding the 77-cent average analyst prediction; net income in the quarter fell to $1.65 billion, or 72 cents a share, from $5.77 billion, or $2.46 a share, a year earlier, when the company posted a gain from an acquisition.
lead_paragraph: The world’s largest soft-drink maker reported a net income of $1.65 billion in the latest quarter, beating analysts’ estimates.

headline.main: Strong Asian Sales Bolster Coca-Cola in 4th Quarter
headline.print_headline: Strong Asian Sales Bolster Coca-Cola in 4th Quarter
